item.description:
RSVP to obtain participation info: http://simplydoit.net/RSVPtoWebinar

---------------------------------------------------------

Topics:

  • What is a Self-Directed IRA
  • Alternative Investments
  • Self-Directed IRA Custodian's Responsibilities
  • Investor's Responsibilities
  • Real Estate Investments
  • Checkbook Control (IRA LLC vs IRA Trust)
  • Prohibited Transactions
  • How To Get Started

About The Speaker:
Michael McNair is a Trust Officer for IRA Services Trust Company. He is a graduate of San Jose State University with a Bachelor’s degree in mathematics. Besides specializing in self-directed retirement accounts for 18 years, Michael has worked as a Systems Engineer and Marketing Representative for IBM, and he has owned and operated two businesses. For the past several years he has been responsible for the fast growth of the company, bringing the total number of accounts to over 35,000 with assets valued at over $3 billion.

 

---------------------------------------------------------

RSVP to obtain participation info: http://simplydoit.net/RSVPtoWebinar
item.name: Do You Understand How the Self-Directed IRA works and Is It for You?
